title: 9 If the building is reconstructed by using Zonal (basic) FSI/permissible FSI, the following shall a
clause_text: 9 If the building is reconstructed by using Zonal (basic) FSI/permissible FSI, the following shall apply: Requirements of open spaces shall be as per Regulation nos. 41(1) and 41(2) & 43
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
